translation.en: Oh, it's so cold.
It's like a thousand needles poking into you.
It finally feels like Christmas.
translation.zh: 终于有点圣诞的感觉了

translation.en: I can't believe you grew up with this. Is this Philly or the ice planet Hoth? [laughs]
translation.zh: 不敢相信你竟然在这种地方长大 这里是费城还是霍斯冰冻星球？

translation.en: Yeah, listen.
Uh, when you first meet my dad, maybe cool it with the Star Wars talk.
translation.zh: 第一次见我老爸 你也许不用 为《星球大战》这么激动

translation.en: Just until he gets to know you. And then...
-I don't know, maybe also after. -Aww.
translation.zh: 不知道 或许了解了也不行

translation.en: You're so cute when you're trying to hide who I am.
translation.zh: 你想把我本性隐藏起来的时候 真是太可爱了

translation.en: Emmy, I got this.
I know. Just... I want him to love you as much as I love you.
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是想让他 像爱我一样那么爱你

translation.en: Okay. Well, my dad said he'd be here at 8:45, and it's 8:40...
translation.zh: 好了 老爸说他8:45到 现在8:40…

translation.en: ...five.
Hey! There he is!
-Hey, Dad! Merry almost-Christmas! -Mmm.
translation.zh: 嘿 老爸 提前祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Welcome home, sweetie!
This must be Matt.
Hey.
Good to finally meet you in person. [chuckles]
How was the flight?
Ah, you know, red-eyes are tough. Always hard to get much sleep.
translation.zh: 你知道 红眼航班 总归不太舒服 很难睡着

translation.en: I can sleep anywhere.
I trained my body to sleep through air strikes
translation.zh: 我在对付萨达姆的沙漠风暴中是排长

translation.en: when I led a platoon in Desert Storm.
translation.zh: 已经习惯了在空袭中睡觉

translation.en: Wow. I just...
take half an Ambien and drink red wine. Your thing's cooler.
translation.zh: 我还得半片安必恩加红酒助眠 还是你厉害

translation.en: Mixing drugs and alcohol.
Interesting.
Okay! Here we go. [claps hands] Let's...
-All right. -Yeah.
[Don] Oh, you got your ax.
So, how's your band? -Had any gigs? -[coughs] Oh.
A few. Mostly still paying our dues.
translation.zh: 有一些 还在打拼阶段

translation.en: Paying dues, not rent, huh?
translation.zh: 打拼？有钱付房租吧 嗯？

translation.en: [chuckles] Just kidding ya.
Good one. [chuckles]
Oh, look at me, back of a cop car.
translation.zh: 哦 看我 都坐上警车了

translation.en: It's like I'm a perp, you know, and you're the-- Oh!
translation.zh: 就好像我是罪犯 你是…

translation.en: I feel like a bad boy back here.
translation.zh: 我坐在后面感觉自己 像《警察》里的“坏小子”

translation.en: Oh, dang it. I left my mittens on the plane.
translation.zh: 哦 要命 我也像他一样 把连指手套落在飞机上了

translation.en: Hey, Em.
You remember my buddy, Ted Boseman?
translation.zh: 你还记得我朋友特德博斯曼吧？

translation.en: -No. -Oh, yeah you do.
translation.zh: -不记得了 -哦 你肯定记得

translation.en: Anyway, I ran into him at church last Sunday,
translation.zh: 总之 我上周日在教堂正巧碰到他

translation.en: and it turns out he's kind of a big deal here at D&P Financial.
translation.zh: 他现在在D&P金融公司当领导

translation.en: And he wants to chat with you about opportunities right here in Philly.
translation.zh: 他还想和你谈谈你在费城发展的机会

translation.en: -Oh. -What, you mean like her move back here?
Seat belt, please.
Dad, I already have a finance job in LA,
translation.zh: 老爸 我在洛杉矶 有份金融相关的工作 而且还和我爱的人一起生活

translation.en: where I live with the guy that I love.
translation.zh: 而且还和我爱的人一起生活

translation.en: -How are you doing back there, sweetie? -Bulletproof glass is hard.
translation.zh: -你在后面怎么样 亲爱的？ -防弹玻璃真够硬的

translation.en: Yeah, forget I mentioned it.
But, uh...
Ah, keep it in mind. [chuckles]
Got the Christmas lights out, ready to go.
translation.zh: 圣诞彩灯都挂出来了 全都准备好了

translation.en: Love it. Love it. [chuckles]
We put our lights up today, and we take them down on New Year's Day.
translation.zh: 我们今天挂出来 新年那天就要收起来了

translation.en: Emmy's mom, she had a rule.
translation.zh: 艾美的妈妈 她有规矩

translation.en: Ten days, that's it. This ain't Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 十天 就十天 这里可不是拉斯维加斯

translation.en: Everybody's coming over tonight for the Quinn family house lighting.
translation.zh: 大家今晚都会过来欣赏奎因家的彩灯

translation.en: Tradition's my dad's favorite thing.
translation.zh: 这个传统是老爸的最爱

translation.en: Right up there with Law & Order. [chuckles] The show and the thing.
translation.zh: 还有《法律与秩序》戏里戏外

translation.en: Our house lighting, tree trimming, caroling, midnight mass,
translation.zh: 我们家的彩灯、 园艺、颂歌、午夜弥撒

translation.en: Christmas brunch, Christmas dinner, a sensible New Year's Eve celebration.
translation.zh: 圣诞早午餐、圣诞晚餐 还有气氛热烈的除夕夜庆典

translation.en: The world might change...
The Quinns...
never will.
Remember when you asked why I moved across the country?
translation.zh: 记得你问我为什么要搬去那么远吗？

translation.en: Here it is!
The house that made all this.
This is nice.
I want the full tour, -but can I take a quick nap? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我想好好转转 不过能先小睡一会儿吗？

translation.en: I just want to be on my game when I meet the--
translation.zh: 我想以我最好的状态见你其他…

translation.en: Oh, my God!
[gasps] The prodigal sister returns. Give me hugs, come here! I want them! Oh!
translation.zh: 流浪妹妹回家了 来抱抱 过来！快点！

translation.en: Matt, this is my sister Patsy and her husband Todd.
translation.zh: 马特 这是我姐帕齐和姐夫托德

translation.en: Mr. Rock 'n' Roller. Coming in for a hug. I'm a hugger.
translation.zh: 大歌星 来抱一下 我喜欢抱人

translation.en: Okay. [squeals]
-Thanks for coming over to welcome us. -Oh, your dad said we had to.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们都过来欢迎我们 -哦 你爸非让我们来的

translation.en: [clears throat] And I said, "Heck, I want to."
translation.zh: 我是说“哦 我们想来的”

translation.en: So, who's hungry? I'm making eggies like Mom used to make.
translation.zh: 都饿了吧？ 我在做老妈以前总做的起司蛋

translation.en: Not as good, obviously. But not bad, if I do say so myself.
translation.zh: 当然没她做的好吃 不过我自己觉得还不错

translation.en: And I do!
Please have an eggie.
-We arrested a mall Santa last night. -[Emmy] Mm.
translation.zh: 我们昨晚抓了个购物中心的圣诞老人

translation.en: He lost a toe breaking into Victoria's Secret.
translation.zh: 他想闯进维多利亚的秘密店里 结果却弄断了自己一根脚趾

translation.en: Nancy, the nurse at the hospital, she says,
translation.zh: 医院有个护士叫南希 她说

translation.en: "Somebody just made his own naughty list."
translation.zh: “某人上了自己的淘气榜榜首”

translation.en: She's a hoot.
Oh. Well, there'll be coal in his lace stocking, huh?
translation.zh: 看来那家伙圣诞节能收到蕾丝袜子了

translation.en: Want to go get some sleep, Matt?
translation.zh: 你不是想休息一下吗 马特？

translation.en: I really do.
-Well, look who's here from Hollyweird. -Hi!
translation.zh: 哦 看看谁从好莱坞城回来了

translation.en: Oh. Matt, this is my brother Sean, his wife Joy.
translation.zh: 马特 这是我哥肖恩 我嫂子乔伊

translation.en: -Hey, Matt! -Sean Jr. Hi!
Donny. Oh, Baby Margie!
translation.zh: 小唐 哦 小玛吉！

translation.en: There'll be a test on these names later.
translation.zh: 稍后会有名字小测试的

translation.en: Not really.
My name's easy. You look at me, what do you see?
translation.zh: 我的名字很简单 你看我就知道 很特别吧？

translation.en: Joy. Donny, stop playing with the knives.
translation.zh: 欢快的乔伊 小唐 把刀给我放下

translation.en: Sean Jr., you are getting so big. You look like you could be an Avenger.
translation.zh: 小肖恩？你都长这么大了 你都能当复仇者联盟的一员了

translation.en: You don't need to do that.
Yeah! He's in a fun new phase.
translation.zh: 对！他已经过了那个阶段了

translation.en: So, Matt. LA boy. You a Rams fan?
translation.zh: 我说 马特 洛杉矶人 你是公羊队粉丝？

translation.en: Uh, I don't really like football.
I love it.
You know, Super Bowls, touchdowns, just all of it.
translation.zh: 超级碗 触地得分 一切的一切

translation.en: Tom Brady. I mean, he's one of 'em.
translation.zh: 汤姆布兰迪 我是说 不止他一个

translation.en: [laughs] You got me. I was like, "Uh-oh, Em got a dud."
translation.zh: 被你吓到了 我还在想“哎哟 艾美找了个窝囊废”

translation.en: Pats, we doing eggies?
translation.zh: 帕齐 要吃起司蛋吗？

translation.en: -Which way is the bathroom? -Right there.
You know, it's just-- It's pee.
He seems nice.
But is he worth staying in California,
translation.zh: 但他能受得了加利福尼亚的

translation.en: with all the earthquakes and the fires and Californians?
translation.zh: 地震、火灾和加利福尼亚人吗？

translation.en: [Alan] At least admit that it was inconsiderate.
translation.zh: 至少你承认有欠考虑吧

translation.en: [Kayla] Oh, my God. It's not that big of a deal, Alan.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 这又不是什么大事 艾伦

translation.en: I just wish you'd shown me the Christmas card
translation.zh: 我只是希望你给我们都认识的人

translation.en: before mailing them to everyone we know.
translation.zh: 发贺卡之前先让我看一眼

translation.en: Great! You can be in charge next year.
translation.zh: 很好！明年归你管行了吧

translation.en: -Good! -Awesome!
-Fantastic! -Can you double-cheese that thing?
translation.zh: -好！太好了！ -非常好！ 多给我加点奶酪行吗？

translation.en: Hi, sis. Sorry we're late.
translation.zh: 嗨 妹妹 抱歉我们迟到了

translation.en: Someone only started caring about the Christmas cards
translation.zh: 我把圣诞贺卡已经寄出去了

translation.en: after I mailed them out this morning.
translation.zh: 某人才开始关心上面写了什么

translation.en: Gosh, who could "someone" be?
translation.zh: 天哪 那个“某人”会是谁呀？

translation.en: How do we crack that code?
Who wants an eggie? Kayla, Alan? You want an eggie?
translation.zh: 谁想来个起司蛋？ 凯拉 艾伦？想吃起司蛋吗？

translation.en: -I want a divorce. -What?
-What? -What?
Okay, I'm sorry I didn't show you the cards.
translation.zh: 好吧 对不起 我不该不给你看贺卡

translation.en: Now, can we please move on?
No. I-I want a divorce.
I didn't mean for it to come out like this, but...
translation.zh: 我不想这么提出来的 可是…

translation.en: [inhales deeply] ...you have to admit we're not happy.
translation.zh: 你必须承认 我们并不幸福

translation.en: You're leaving me?
Now? Well, there's not really a good time.
translation.zh: -现在？ -是 现在这个时机是不太好

translation.en: Yes, there is.
When you die. That's when you leave, Alan.
translation.zh: 除非你死了 那时候你就能走了 艾伦

translation.en: Till death do us part.
Death, Alan, not Christmas.
translation.zh: 艾伦 除非你死了 圣诞绝对不行

translation.en: Hey. Let me guess. Kayla and Alan.
translation.zh: 嘿 让我猜猜 凯拉和艾伦

translation.en: [chuckles] Patsy, I think I'm ready for that name test.
translation.zh: 帕齐 我想那个名字测试难不倒我了

translation.en: We fight every day.
We haven't had sex in a year!
I can't believe you're talking about this in front of my entire family.
translation.zh: 不敢相信 你竟然在我全家人面前提这个

translation.en: And that guy.
You're with your entire family all the time.
translation.zh: 你一直和全家人在一起

translation.en: Everything happens in front of them, and because of them.
translation.zh: 什么都避不开他们 全都是因为他们

translation.en: We're the reason you're bailing on your marriage?
translation.zh: 我们成了你抛弃婚姻的理由？

translation.en: We're the problem?
We're delightful.
translation.zh: 我们的问题就是对人太好

translation.en: Kay.
We don't have kids.
So, yeah,
I think it's best to rip the Band-Aid off and move on.
translation.zh: 我想我们最好一拍两散继续生活

translation.en: And Don, did you just unsnap the holster of your service revolver?
translation.zh: 唐 你刚才是在解开配枪的枪套？

translation.en: If you want to leave,
then go.
Now.
Back door, buddy.
Your mom's eggies?
Always too salty.
No wonder he didn't want our cards to go out.
translation.zh: 难怪他不想把贺卡都寄出去

translation.en: "Happy Holidays from Kayla and Alan?"
It was a lie.
Honey, uh...
You put "Happy Holidays," not "Merry Christmas?"
translation.zh: 你写的“节日快乐”不是“圣诞快乐”？

translation.en: He means that we love you
translation.zh: 他是想说 我们都爱你

translation.en: -and we're here for you. -Yes. Honey.
translation.zh: -你还有我们在 -对 宝贝儿

translation.en: -Of course. -[Kayla] What am I gonna do?
I woke up this morning and everything was fine, and now...
translation.zh: 我今早醒来还都好好的 现在

translation.en: Now, I don't even want to go home.
translation.zh: 现在我连家都不想回了

translation.en: But you could stay here.
As long as you want. This will always be your home.
translation.zh: 想待多久就待多久 这里永远是你的家

translation.en: [Emmy] Yeah.
And I'll be here.
[Patsy] Ooh, it'll be just like the old days.
I'm sorry, Mom.
A Quinn getting divorced.
translation.zh: 奎恩家的一个女儿 离婚了

translation.en: I don't know what happened.
Well? Hug me!
Oh, Jesus!
Sorry.
-What are you guys doing? -Nothing.
Just... this eggnog went bad.
Yeah, it's just a bad...
-nog situation. -[Matt] Oh.
Looked like you were pouring one out to someone.
translation.zh: 看起来好像你们在敬天上的哪位

translation.en: [laughs] No. No.
No.
I feel so bad for Kayla.
translation.zh: 凯拉的事我觉得很抱歉

translation.en: Yeah.
But...
you know...
Two sides to every story.
Alan has his issues, but Kayla can be a bit of a--
translation.zh: 艾伦有他自己的问题 凯拉也问题…

translation.en: -Pill. -A big pill.
Wow. Okay.
You know, I-I like getting the in-laws take on this stuff,
translation.zh: 听着 我想学学 这家里姻亲女婿什么的规矩

translation.en: 'cause I'm hoping to be one of you guys soon.
translation.zh: 因为我很希望能尽快成为家里的一员

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Emmy to marry me.
Christmas morning.
We need to tell him.
-No, we can't trust him. -He needs to know.
translation.zh: -不行 我们不能信任他 -他应该知道

translation.en: Obviously, I can hear you.
Hi.
Okay, look. Emmy's great. You guys should totally get married.
translation.zh: 好吧 听着 艾美很好 你们俩完全应该结婚

translation.en: Just do it far away from here.
translation.zh: 不过要离这里越远越好

translation.en: LA's good. Hawaii's better.
translation.zh: 可以在洛杉矶 夏威夷更好

translation.en: Guam is still America.
-[Kayla] I don't know what happened. -B-B-Be cool.
-[Patsy] We're here for you. -[Don] Of course.
We were pouring one out.
To Alan.
We have a sort of support group.
Support group for what?
The people who married into this family.
The Quinns are great.
But when they're together, which is almost every day...
translation.zh: 但他们一到一起 差不多天天吧

translation.en: Pizza Fridays, Sunday brunches, pop-ins, stop-bys, meetups, hangouts.
translation.zh: 周五比萨、周日早午餐、临时小聚 顺路拜访、聚头会、碰面会

translation.en: Don has a saying: "There's the Quinn way and the wrong way."
translation.zh: 唐有一句“不从奎因者 即错”

translation.en: How to spend your money. How to vote. Where to vacation.
translation.zh: 怎么花钱 怎么选举 去哪休假

translation.en: -What kind of soda to drink. -Pepsi.
It's always got to be Pepsi.
And our spouses think the Quinn way is normal.
translation.zh: 夫妻按奎因规定喝什么都是正常

translation.en: But it's like a cult.
A G-rated cult.
We secretly meet at this bar, Otto's. Just to talk stuff out.
translation.zh: 所以我们会 在奥多小馆秘密集会来讨论对策

translation.en: And the family will never catch us there because Quinns don't drink.
translation.zh: 没人会发现我们 因为奎恩家人都不喝酒

translation.en: Don says alcohol is a crutch, which I guess is true,
translation.zh: 唐说酒是害人精 我赞同 不过你懂的

translation.en: but also, you know, shut up. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 唐说酒是害人精 我赞同 不过你懂的 去他的

translation.en: We, uh, call ourselves the Outlaw In-laws.
-No, we don't. Todd does. -It's good.
translation.zh: -不 没有 是托德自己 -很好的名字

translation.en: Outlaw In-laws! [laughs]
Thanks. But Emmy's not like that at all.
translation.zh: 听着 谢谢你们 但是艾美绝不是那样的人 她喝可乐喝酒

translation.en: She drinks Coke and alcohol.
translation.zh: 但是艾美绝不是那样的人 她喝可乐喝酒

translation.en: That's because she's been away.
But in the four or five days you're here, she'll get sucked back in.
translation.zh: 你们在家四五天 她就变回去了

translation.en: We're here for ten days.
-Oh, Lord. -Oh, you poor bastard.
translation.zh: -哦 天哪 -哦 可怜的家伙

translation.en: -[strumming] -Hey.
I'm so glad you're here.
Me too.
How do you think I'm doing so far?
translation.zh: 你觉得目前为止我表现怎么样？

translation.en: Great.
In fact, you'd better pace yourself with all that charm.
translation.zh: 其实你最好调整一下 保存点实力

translation.en: We still got a lot of trip left.
translation.zh: 我们还有很长的路要走

translation.en: Oh, well, I have a lot of charm left. -With razzle-dazzle to spare. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我还有很多能让人神魂颠倒的实力呢

translation.en: [chuckles] Can I take a nap now?
-[Kayla] Oh, look. -Oh!
The lovebirds.
Hey, Kayla.
How you feelin'?
Sad. [exhales]
Angry.
Confused.
A little hungry.
Well, how about a little food for the soul?
translation.zh: 那给你来点精神食粮怎么样？

translation.en: Any requests?
Do you know the song "Not Now" by you?
translation.zh: 你知道你的那首“现在算了”的歌吗？

translation.en: So, Matt.
Kayla and I shared this room when we were kids.
translation.zh: 我和凯拉小时候同住这间房

translation.en: -Yeah. Now it's her and you. -Yeah.
I just keep getting cut out of people's lives.
translation.zh: 我就会破坏别人的生活

translation.en: Oh, well...
Do you want to stay in here with me tonight?
translation.zh: 你今晚要不要留下来和我一起？

translation.en: Matt could take the spare room. Right, Matt?
translation.zh: 马特可以去客房睡 对吧 马特？

translation.en: Oh, yes. That would make me feel so much better.
translation.zh: 哦 好 这样我感觉好多了

translation.en: -Oh, good. -Thank you.
Oh, you want me to go now?
-Mm-hmm. -[softly] Thank you.
Man, puberty hit the Keller kids hard.
translation.zh: 啊呀 凯勒家的孩子 被青春期撞得不轻啊

translation.en: -Hey, can I talk to you guys? -Sure, sweetie.
translation.zh: -嘿 我能和你们谈谈吗？ -当然可以 宝贝儿

translation.en: Oh, a sit-down talk.
You're not pregnant, are you?
So... [exhales]
I know you've been wondering why I've been all, like, quiet lately.
translation.zh: 我知道你们都在想 我最近为什么有点不爱说话了

translation.en: [exhales] I've been trying to figure out how to tell you.
translation.zh: 我一直在想怎么和你们说

translation.en: I, um...
I have these feelings.
In me.
I tried talking myself out of it,
translation.zh: 我努力说服自己不去想它

translation.en: feeling this way, but...
translation.zh: 不要有这种感觉 但是…

translation.en: ...it's who I am.
Sorry, go ahead.
Or we could do this later. Up to you. You want to do it later?
translation.zh: 或者我们晚点再谈 你说呢 想晚点再谈吗？

translation.en: [Sean Jr. sighs] No.
I wanted you to know that I'm...
I'm an atheist.
Oh, we love you no matter--
translation.zh: 不管怎么样我们都爱你

translation.en: What?
He's an atheist.
I thought he was gonna say...
I'm having more water.
I was nervous to tell you 'cause you raised me all Catholic
translation.zh: 我不敢告诉你们 因为你们一直把我当天主教徒培养 我不想让你们生气

translation.en: and I didn't want to upset you.
translation.zh: 因为你们一直把我当天主教徒培养 我不想让你们生气

translation.en: Oh, we're not upset.
Right, Sean?
So, do I tell Poppy Don
translation.zh: 那是要我还是你们去告诉爷爷唐

translation.en: I'm not going to church on Christmas Eve, or should you?
How's that now?
I mean, obviously I'm not gonna go and just pretend to believe in God.
translation.zh: 我是说 我肯定不会去假装信仰上帝

translation.en: [laughs] Right. No. Obviously not.
translation.zh: 对 不 当然不了

translation.en: Kayla, guess what I did to make you feel better.
translation.zh: 凯拉 猜猜我做了什么能让你好过点

translation.en: Invented a time machine and undid all my life choices.
translation.zh: 发明了时光机 取消了我人生的全部选择

translation.en: Almost. Um, yeah.
I, uh, dug up Mom's old Christmas cookie cutters, and...
translation.zh: 对 我找到了 老妈做圣诞饼干用的旧模子 然后…

translation.en: Ta-da!
They remind me of Mom.
-Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't think that-- -I still want them.
translation.zh: -哦 对不起 我没想到… -还是给我吧

translation.en: Hey, um...
You don't need to keep trying to be Mom for her.
Yeah. [chuckles]
-Gonna keep trying to be Mom for her? -So much.
translation.zh: -还要继续给她当“妈妈”？ -太对了

translation.en: This is going to look great.
I mean, that angel is...
angelic.
It goes on the roof.
Represents Emmy's mom, looking down on all of us.
translation.zh: 代表艾美她妈 在上面看着我们

translation.en: Wow.
Yeah, we've had this house lighting tradition for years.
translation.zh: 是 我们的彩灯传统都好多年了

translation.en: We let the grandkids flip on the lights. We sing carols, drink hot cider.
translation.zh: 让孙子们打开彩灯 我们唱颂歌 喝热苹果汁

translation.en: Oh, I love hot cider.
People are always coming up to me, like, "Hot chocolate rules."
translation.zh: 他们总是一上来 就和我说“热巧克力好喝”

translation.en: I'm like, "Get away, dude. No way.
translation.zh: 我说“得了吧 拿开 没门

translation.en: I'm a cider guy. Hot cider for me, thanks."
translation.zh: 我是苹果汁粉 给我热苹果汁 谢谢”

translation.en: We're gonna have hot chocolate, too.
Also really good.
Anyway...
I'm in love with your daughter, Mr. Quinn.
translation.zh: 我爱你女儿 奎因先生

translation.en: And when a man loves a woman who...
has a father...
traditionally...
Are you asking for my blessing to marry Emmy?
translation.zh: 你想让我祝福你和我女儿艾美？

translation.en: Yes, I-I was.
I am.
You are the first of my three daughters' suitors
translation.zh: 你是我三个女儿的追求者中

translation.en: to have the guts to do this.
translation.zh: 第一个有勇气这么做的

translation.en: I really appreciate it.
You are quite welcome. [chuckles]
Which makes it that much harder to say no.
translation.zh: 所以我要更坚决地说“不行”

translation.en: You know, after this whole Alan thing, I just...
translation.zh: 你知道 出了艾伦那事 我…

translation.en: realized I got to be more careful about who I let into this family.
translation.zh: 我意识到我在选女婿这件事上 一定要更加谨慎

translation.en: [sighs] But thanks for asking.
translation.zh: 不过还是谢谢你提出来

translation.en: It means a lot.
Not enough, but a lot.
translation.zh: 不够重要 但是很重要

translation.en: So he stomped on your hopes and dreams. Welcome to the club, buddy.
translation.zh: 这么说他践踏了你的希望和梦想 欢迎加入我们帮 哥们儿

translation.en: I don't need his permission to ask, you know?
translation.zh: 我其实不用问他 对吧？

translation.en: I was just trying to be a gentleman.
See, that's why I didn't ask for permission to marry Patsy.
translation.zh: 看吧 这就是我为什么 没问他就娶了帕齐的原因

translation.en: Lost his respect, but avoided his wrath. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 虽然没他的尊重 但也不用承受他的怒火

translation.en: Wassup!
Like I said, hold off on asking Emmy to marry you on this trip.
translation.zh: 像我说的 向艾美求婚 这次就算了吧

translation.en: But Christmas is the perfect time.
translation.zh: 可是圣诞节是最合适的时机

translation.en: You know what? He thinks he can intimidate me.
translation.zh: 知道吗？他以为他能吓倒我

translation.en: But when I want something, I go for it.
translation.zh: 但我是不达目的不罢休的人

translation.en: I just need to prove to him that I'm good enough.
translation.zh: 我要向他证明 我是称职的

translation.en: No. Not good enough.
Perfect.
-He's like a hurt baby duck. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 他就像只受了伤害的小鸭子

translation.en: You want to help, but maybe it's best to let him waddle into the bushes -and die. -Oh.
translation.zh: 你想帮他 但似乎最明智的做法 就是让他踉踉跄跄走下去 最后死掉

translation.en: Oh, God.
Hey. Just wanted to check in, see if you needed any help.
translation.zh: 嘿 我只是来看看 你需不需要帮忙

translation.en: I want to show you that I'm a, uh... a, uh...
a vessel of dependability.
A vessel of--
Are you high, rock star?
translation.zh: 你喝多了 摇滚明星？

translation.en: 'Cause you know I can still bust you for that. This ain't LA.
translation.zh: 因为你知道 我还能因为酗酒抓你 这里可不是洛杉矶

translation.en: Or Colorado. Or Maine, or Alaska, or...
translation.zh: 或者科罗拉多州 或者缅因州、阿拉斯加州或者…

translation.en: Good Lord, it'd take less time to tell you the good states.
translation.zh: 天哪 说像样一点的州 可不用浪费这么多时间

translation.en: Matt? What are you doing up there?
Just, uh, helping your dad with the lights.
Dad, do you want help?
translation.zh: 老爸 你需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: [Don] Sure don't.
Matt, come on, we're making a fire. Come watch Elf with me and Kayla.
translation.zh: 马特 走吧 我们在生火呢 来和我和凯拉一起看《圣诞精灵》吧

translation.en: [Emmy] My family's gonna be here in an hour.
translation.zh: 大家再有一小时就都来了

translation.en: It's best to just let my dad do things his way. The Quinn way.
translation.zh: 那些最好让老爸自己按他想的弄吧 -按奎因家的规矩来 -其实 我都没觉得有这么晚了

translation.en: [Don] Actually, I didn't know it was that late.
translation.zh: -按奎因家的规矩来 -其实 我都没觉得有这么晚了

translation.en: I'm gonna need some help to finish in time.
translation.zh: 我得要人帮我赶快弄完才行

translation.en: Great. I'll stay.
I am here for you.
All right.
[grunting] On the roof.
Which is actually a lot higher than you'd think.
translation.zh: 其实比你想象的难得多

translation.en: I got a bad feeling about this.
Hey, nice.
That's a line from Star Wars.
translation.zh: 这是《星球大战》里的一句台词

translation.en: It's actually repeated in many of the, uh-- Oh, you don't care.
translation.zh: 其实这句重复过好多… 哦 你不关心那个

translation.en: You know, this is actually still a little crooked.
translation.zh: 我说 这个还是有点歪

translation.en: -Let me fix it real quick. -Hey.
-We still have a lot to do. -[Matt grunts]
I hear you, Mr. Quinn. But as an artist,
translation.zh: 我听到了 奎因先生 但是作为一个艺术家

translation.en: -I have an eye for these things. -Hey, look!
translation.zh: -我有一双敏锐的眼睛 -嘿 看着点！

translation.en: I know you probably hate the term "artist."
translation.zh: 我知道你可能不喜欢“艺术家”这词

translation.en: No, no! Look! Look!
-Sorry. Sorry! -Don't stomp on her! That's my wife!
Wait.
Oh, my-- Oh, my God, it's sticking right in you.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 它扎到你脸上了

translation.en: Oh, look at it. Look at it! Look!
I can't. It's in my forehead.
translation.zh: 我看不到 它在我额头上

translation.en: You are definitely tougher than our nine-toed Santa.
translation.zh: 你肯定比我们的九指圣诞老人厉害

translation.en: [chuckles] Well...
that's the nice part about getting shot early in my career, Nancy.
translation.zh: 这就是职业初期 挨过枪子的好处 南希

translation.en: Any pain after that is just playing for second.
translation.zh: 之后再有什么痛都不算事了

translation.en: My son was ten pounds at birth.
Every pain since, I'm like, "If it ain't a giant baby being yanked out of me,
translation.zh: 那之后不管再怎么痛 我都会想 “只要不是巨婴 什么都行”

translation.en: bring it."
translation.zh: “只要不是巨婴 什么都行”

translation.en: [Don] This kid staples me in the head and he's the one who faints.
translation.zh: 这孩子钉了我的头 他自己倒晕了

translation.en: I can't believe this is the one my daughter brings home.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我女儿 就带了这么个家伙回来

translation.en: Look, Mr. Quinn. Don.
translation.zh: 听着 奎因先生 唐

translation.en: I know you're used to getting your way, but you--
translation.zh: 我知道你说什么是什么习惯了 可你…

translation.en: Oh, my God. Is that sticking in your brain?!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 那东西伤到你大脑了？

translation.en: Help me, help--
He's a bigger pain than a ten-pound baby.
translation.zh: 他比九斤的巨婴还要痛

translation.en: You're such a hoot.
You're all alone on the holidays, too.
Aunt Kayla's talking to a fish.
It's been a long day, bud.
translation.zh: 这一天够多事的了 孩子

translation.en: Where'd Sean Jr. go?
He's talking to my dad. I knew I shouldn't have brought him.
translation.zh: 他在和我爸说话 我就知道不该带他来

translation.en: You don't think he's gonna tell him he's an atheist
translation.zh: 你觉得他不会在爷爷还在医院的时候

translation.en: when he's in the hospital, do you?
I actually think we should be proud of Sean Jr. for not hiding who he is.
translation.zh: 实际上我觉得我们应该为小肖恩 不隐瞒自己的本性而骄傲

translation.en: Maybe everybody shouldn't have to tiptoe around your dad.
translation.zh: 也许大家都不必对自己爸爸畏首畏尾

translation.en: Kayla's talking to a fish and she seems less crazy than you right now.
translation.zh: 凯拉在和鱼说话 但她好像现在也没有你疯得厉害

translation.en: I tried to be there for Kayla like Mom would've,
translation.zh: 我努力想像老妈还在的时候 那样安慰凯拉

translation.en: but everything I did today just made her feel worse.
translation.zh: 但是不管我今天做什么 都只不过让她更加难过了

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not cut out for it.
translation.zh: 或许我真的不是那块料

translation.en: Being a mom.
I know it's taking longer than we thought, but it's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我知道我们备孕很久了 但是总有一天会成功的

translation.en: Okay? And when it does,
you're gonna be great.
Now Aunt Kayla's stealing the fish.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -现在凯拉姑姑又在偷鱼了

translation.en: Our kid will be easier than her.
Hey, bud. I saw you talking to Poppy Don in there.
translation.zh: 嘿 小家伙 我看到你和爷爷唐说话了

translation.en: That's fun.
I decided not to tell him.
[exhales] Oh, thank God.
We're good.
[laughing] Okay.
I'm gonna go put my face against some cold glass.
translation.zh: 我去找个凉快的杯子冰冰脸

translation.en: Sweetie,
you know you don't have to be afraid to tell Poppy Don the truth, right?
translation.zh: 你知道 你不用害怕 和爷爷唐说真话吧？

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I went in there to tell him. Then I asked how he was doing.
translation.zh: 我本来进去想和他说的 然后我问他感觉怎么样

translation.en: And he said he knew he'd be fine
translation.zh: 他说他知道他不会有事

translation.en: because Grammy Margaret was up in heaven watching over him
translation.zh: 因为奶奶玛格丽特在天堂守护着他

translation.en: and all of us.
[sighs] I just couldn't do it to the guy.
translation.zh: 我就不忍心告诉那老头了

translation.en: Well, I guess Dad's house lighting is canceled.
translation.zh: 看来老爸的家庭彩灯是取消了

translation.en: This is just...
The nurse is making me.
I see what you're trying to do.
translation.zh: 我看出来你想干什么了

translation.en: Fighting for Emmy.
I'm just doing the same thing.
Hey, so we have loving Emmy in common.
translation.zh: 嘿 所以我们有个共同点 就是我们都爱艾美

translation.en: That's something, right?
In that it makes us opponents?
translation.zh: 让我们成为敌手的共同点？

translation.en: Okay.
Did you finish your juice?
Yes.
No.
[sighs] When you're finished, you're clear to go.
You, on the other hand, your heart rate's a bit elevated.
translation.zh: 不过你 你心率有点高

translation.en: So I get to keep you a little longer.
translation.zh: 所以我要让你多留一会儿了

translation.en: [Don] Well...
guess there's worse things.
You, uh...
You like her.
Who? Nancy?
No.
[stammers] Uh, I like her as someone that I work with, but I don't like her like her. I mean...
translation.zh: 我喜欢她是那种同事之间的喜欢 不是那种“喜欢她”的喜欢她

translation.en: But even if I did,
it's only been three years since my wife died.
And, uh, again,
I don't like her.
And why am I explaining myself to you? Let's get you out of here.
translation.zh: 为什么我要和你废话？你快点走吧

translation.en: Okay, Donny.
Hot cider for you, sir.
translation.zh: 这是给你的热苹果汁 先生

translation.en: You couldn't be home for the lights, so I figured we bring the lights to you.
translation.zh: 你不能回家欣赏彩灯 我就想不如我们把彩灯给你带来吧

translation.en: [exhales] This is something.
I bet Mom's looking down and smiling.
translation.zh: 我敢说妈妈在上面看到也笑了

translation.en: You guys did all this for them?
translation.zh: 这都是你们为他们做的？

translation.en: Eh, this family's a pain in the butt, but they're our pain in the butt.
translation.zh: 这个家是讨厌 但是那是让我们讨厌

translation.en: -But yeah, they are a pain in the butt. -Such a pain in the butt. Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 他们是很让人讨厌 -太讨厌了 对

translation.en: -Sorry it's been so crazy. -[Matt sighs]
translation.zh: 抱歉 这一切都太疯狂了

translation.en: Oh, at least it's going by quick.
We've already been here, what? Three, four days?
translation.zh: 我们回来几天了 三天 四天？

translation.en: -Twelve hours. -Oh, God.
Oh, hi. [chuckles]
Look at you two. Matching bracelets.
translation.zh: 看看你们俩 情侣手环

translation.en: -Bracelet buddies. -[Don laughs]
Don't ruin it.
Uh... you know what would make this perfect?
If you'd just agree to meet with Ted Boseman.
translation.zh: 你要是同意见见特德博斯曼就好了

translation.en: -Oh, God. -Not to take a job, just to chat.
translation.zh: -哦 天哪 -不是要硬塞给你工作 就是聊一聊

translation.en: You know,
as a favor to an old man who just got staple-gunned in the head.
translation.zh: 就算是帮一回 被钉枪钉了脑袋的老朋友

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
Okay. Stop bugging me and I'll do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 别烦我了 我见就是了

translation.en: Mmm. ♪ It's beginning to look a lot Like Christmas ♪
Wait.
So you are going to meet with that guy?
Oh, just to get my dad off my back. Seriously, don't worry.
translation.zh: 哦 就是不想让老爸再唠叨了 真的 别担心

translation.en: Worry. Seriously.
Don always gets his way.
-The Quinn way. -Definitely.
I wonder what would happen if we could somehow loosen Don up a bit.
translation.zh: 我想知道如果我们 别那么针对唐 会怎么样？

translation.en: I mean, that'd be good for all of us, right?
translation.zh: 我是说 会不会对大家都好一点？

translation.en: The Quinns and Quinn-laws.
translation.zh: 奎因规矩就奎因规矩呗

translation.en: [scoffs] Quinn-laws.
Oh, that's good. He's good.
translation.zh: 哦 那样好 他真好

translation.en: Hey, Ted.
Emmy has agreed to meet with you.
Now, all you have to do is just make her a job offer that she can't refuse,
translation.zh: 你只要给她一份 让她无法拒绝的工作就行

translation.en: and you will have paid me back for not arresting you
for drunk and disorderly,
and attempting to intoxicate a police horse.
translation.zh: 和企图毒死警马的人情了

translation.en: Yeah.
That was a heck of a Thanksgiving night you had there, Ted.
translation.zh: 你那晚遇到我真是走了大运了 特德
